itemDescription: United States Marine Corps Medal of Honor recipient

wikipedia_page.main: Edward Alexander Walker (October 2, 1864 – October 24, 1946) was a Sergeant serving in the United States Marine Corps during the Boxer Rebellion who received the Medal of Honor for bravery.

response: * Edward Alexander Walker (1864–1946), American Medal of Honor recipient
* Edward Alexander Walker (1864–1946), Medal of Honor recipient for service in the Boxer Rebellion
